name: Lost in the Woods (mortalfosca, ilkerbulut, batubond007, Lunaxolotl, Yamanefe, ibrahimsrkdl)
name_original: Lost in the Woods (mortalfosca, ilkerbulut, batubond007, Lunaxolotl, Yamanefe, ibrahimsrkdl)
description:
Code: Yamanefe Uğurlu

Art: Ece Çınar, İlker Bulut, Doruk Bildibay

Sound: Batuhan Çalışkan

Narrative Design: İbrahim Sarıkodal

Voice Actors: Ece as Sofi, Batuhan as Andre, İlker as Tim, Doruk as Louis

This game is developed as part of a 48hr game jam hosted by METU GATES.
